name: Conferences That Pay Their Speakers
tagline: What it says on the tin.
body:
* [Black Hat Briefings](https://blackhat.com/)
* [DEF CON](https://defcon.org/)
* [INFILTRATE](http://infiltratecon.net/)
* [SEC-T](https://www.sec-t.org/)

Are we missing a conference? [Send us a pull request!](https://github.com/abiggerhammer/conferencesthatpaytheirspeakers.org/pulls) 

Please keep the list alphabetical, and thanks for your help.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
